thread.title: Kam Chancellor#039;s Teammates Want Him to Get Paid
thread.title_full: Kam Chancellor#039;s Teammates Want Him to Get Paid

title: Kam Chancellor#039;s Teammates Want Him to Get Paid
text:
Get Sports Alerts 
7 Oct 2015 07:40 AM EST 
The Seahawks defeated the Lions 13-10 on Monday Night Football with a controversial play that involved Kam Chancellor punching the football out of Calvin Johnsonâ€™s hands. The NFL admitted today however, that officials failed to make the correct call on the play. Tight end Michael Bennett video-bombed his Seattle teammate in a post-game interview, declaring that Paul Allen owed Kam Chancellor his money.
